data.name: Iragon Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content that is not appropriate for young players and may not be appropriate for viewing at work. It contains Nudity, Sexual Acts, Mature Language, Unrealistic/Cartoon Violence, and Alcohol use.
